function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate replenishment of goods during the pandemic resulted in consumers quickly switching to other retailers, potentially increasing the spread of contagious diseases as people move between different stores and locations.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in the hospitality industry","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to long queues and crowded stores","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing measures in smaller retailers leading to higher risk of infection","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High demand for groceries leading to crowded supermarkets","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Elderly shoppers still going to crowded places","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Community transmission in workplaces and public venues","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Confirmed cases of coronavirus in singapore","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic spread across the world","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Divergent perceptions of coronavirus threat","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Perceived health threat of coronavirus","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived susceptibility of contracting coronavirus","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear towards the coronavirus","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Medical and psychological maladies due to stress and isolation","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misperception of pandemic threat and self-efficacy","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Perceived threat influencing protective or defensive motivations","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Maladaptive approaches due to low perceived efficacy","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited response to fear appeals in diverse research contexts","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived susceptibility and perceived severity of contagious diseases","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Belief that the threat is highly exaggerated","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Team members’ health is a priority","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"In-person gatherings for learning sessions and webinars can increase the risk of contagious disease transmission among employees.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Staff turnover reduction and engagement initiatives may lead to complacency in following health and safety protocols, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Travel initiatives, such as sending employees back to their own country, may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper health and safety measures are not implemented during travel.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate training and knowledge sharing may lead to a lack of preparedness for handling contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clarity around what constitutes acceptable reasons for absence may lead to employees with contagious diseases coming to work.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"In-person meetings and training pose a risk of contagious disease transmission due to close contact and shared spaces.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Employee entertainment events with communal sharing of food and social gatherings pose a risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of necessary supplies and cleanliness protocols pose a risk of contagious disease transmission and inadequate containment practices.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Employees not complying with social distancing rules","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employees concerned about exposure to contagious diseases in the workplace.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to lack of hygiene and cleanliness standards in hotels.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Employees being infected with covid-19","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagion for frontline covid-19 fighters","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread through close contact among employees and guests","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Antibiotic overuse leading to drug resistance and ineffective treatment of infectious diseases.","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health system vulnerability in regions with limited resources, affecting access to care and critical healthcare services.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste disposal posing biohazard risks, including potential transmission of covid-19.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control of covid-19 in informal settlements","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ignored public health regulations in informal settlements","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear and reliable information about the disease and control measures","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical distancing and isolation strategies in congested areas","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective settlement-wide quarantines during the ebola outbreak led to violence and were ultimately abandoned.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk of virus exposure for people with disabilities due to reliance on others and limited ability to self-isolate.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated spread of virus due to population fleeing or traveling under the radar","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Haphazard health seeking behavior in severe disease cases","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of inadequate or inappropriate care at hospitals","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear of seeking care due to messaging about no cure for covid-19","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of undetected and poorly managed chronic conditions in communities, increasing the risk of large numbers of people being at risk.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"}]}
